      • sendColor

        public void sendColor(int red,
                      int green,
                      int blue,
                      int ambient)
        Send the current color information on MQTT requests, Only for test, virtual robots will not invoke this.
        Parameters:
        red - Red intensity, [0,255]
        green - Green intensity, [0,255]
        blue - Blue intensity, [0,255]
        ambient - Ambient status, [0,255]
